name: Trivia Vault: Mixed Trivia 2
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault: Mixed Trivia 2 and bring your thinking hat. Answer mixed category trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space
